name: Cornflake Crisis
description:
Get a great start to your day with crispy, nutritious platforming! Embark on an a-maize-ing adventure as a team of cereal flakes on a quest for the legendary Cornucopia!

  • Play as a succession of 50 happy-go-lucky cornflakes!
  • Explore a diverse world of food-themed levels such as the Broccoli Forest, the Dessert Dungeon and a Haunted Gingerbread House!
  • Bump into all kinds of weird and wonderful characters along the way!
  • Hand-drawn graphics bursting with colour and personality!
  • A joyous labour of love by a solo developer!
  • Fortified with an awesome, funky soundtrack that will put a smile on your face!
  • There's a bit where you can help a banana with arms and legs build a sandcastle!
  • Play in English, French, German or Spanish!
  • STEAM DESCRIPTIONS WITH WAY TOO MANY EXCLAMATION MARKS!!!

Warning: may contain corn-y jokes.
